summary: In 1913, laconic sea captain Corto Maltese, adrift in the Pacific, gets rescued by his bandit friend Rasputin who's taking two rich shipwrecked teens to an island where his boss the Monk will hold them for ransom. WWI complicates things.
cast: Jacques Bouanich|Marc Chapiteau|David Le Rheun|Mark Lesser|Jean-Baptiste Malartre|Bruno Raffaelli|Frédéric van den Driessche|Damien Witecka|Richard Berry|Patrick Bouchitey|Barbara Schulz
title: Corto Maltés: La balada del mar salado
